eka dawasak ohu thamage minisun siyalu dena samaga haritha warna thanabim walin pirunu kandawuru badinta ithamath sudusu bimak hoyagena yanta thiranaya kala.
thawa duratath panthi wala arambhayed kriyathmaka wana yedim yanadiyada waradi haduna ganimata samamatha kramayakda aluthinma hadunwa dena ladi.
namuth giyawara chithrapataye awasanaya ha yam sambandhayak athuwa godanageyi kiyana eka anumaneta adahas karanawa kawuruth.

brithanyaye wiktoriya rajina saha albat kumaru owunge windsar kasal hi gathakarana niwaduwa samarime kotasak lesa gasak alankara kirimata aarambha kirimath samanga 1848 di naththal gasa janaya athara apurwa naththal sarasillak lesa janapriya wiya.

ee atharama manirathnamge chithrapata jathyanthara washayen prakatawannata adala charitha sandaha ohu thoraganna nalu, niliyan balapana bawa sihikarana mema lipiya prabhakarange jiwitha kathawe sihina nalu nili kandayama mese wisthara karayi.
mama ee prashnaya asuweth onna oya tika mathukara ganna.
ehema dawasaka thamayi ingrisi dewana piriyad eke anthima hariyedi wasanthayata jangiye chu giye.
shreshta pudgalayek wunata wadak naha salli nathnam..

athhada balimak washayen pasugiya mayi masaye pramukhatha manthiru kramaya handunwadun athara eya sarthaka wu bawin ema kramawedaya rata pura handunwa dimata rajaya thiranaya kala bawa maha nagara ha basnahira sanwardhana amathyanshaya kiya sitiyeya.
ehema hadissiye rata gedara yanta bariunahama nawathinta api dethun denek ekathuwela gest hawus ekaka kamarayak aran thibba.
7 oba gos prithiyen obe kama ka, thrupthimath sithin obe mudrika panaya bonna.
ee, pasugiya kalaye me athdakima masakata dewarak thunwarak wath bagin athwinda ahaka balagena sitime purudda samajayak lesa apa hondin pa්raguna kara athi nisaya.

kolambaa aluthkade pradeshaye nithi wirodhi lesa randi siti wideshikayin pirisak polisiya athadanguwata gena thibe.indiya jathikayin 25 deneku saha nepala jathikayin thideneku melesa athadanguwata path wi athi bawa polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari prishantha jayakodi mahatha pawasuweya.

mohuta wiruddhawa katayuthu kala yuthu thawath hethuwak wanne mohu ha koti dayasporawe kriyakarin athara athi sabadathawayi.

awashyama de nokara wyaja upakramawalin durwala samajayakwath mella kala nohaki bawa aanduwa therum gatha yuthuya.
